CustomField.formula: (CASE(Prospect_Showed_Interest__c, 'Yes - Email',1, 'Yes - Phone (SDR)',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(Confirmation_Email_Sent__c, 'Yes - Phone (SDR)',1, 'Yes',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE (Calendar_Invite_Accepted__c, 'Yes - Confirmed on Phone (SDR)',1, 'Yes',1, 'Client Handoff',1, 'No',0, 0))/3
CustomField.label: Bionic Appointment Score
